record.dc:title: 88Ms32 McKee Island Site, Marshall County, Alabama. Associated artifacts from Burial #44.
record.dc:creator: Archer; Battle
record.wpa:narrative: Associated artifacts from Burial # 44. Top row, left to right; F.S. #80 (stone pipe) and F.S. #87-2, #87-9, #87-9 and #87-1 (four copper trade bells). In center of (no F.S. #) copper collar, F.S. #95 (bracelet and copper spangles). Second row from top, left to right; F.S. #79 (effigy pipe) and F.S. #82 (glass trade beads). Second row from botom; F.S. #89-14, #89-12, #89-10, #89-8 and #89-9 (five lithic knives and scraper). Bottom row; F.S. #89-2, ##89-19, #89-16, #89-20, #89-4, #89-18, #89-7, #89-3, #89-1 and #89-15 (ten lithic knives and scrapers).
